title: IAA Tonight | NFL Owners Beef AND Is Tom Brady No Longer Enjoying the Game?
description: There's seems to be some beef amongst NFL owners, and perhaps between the two biggest in Robert Kraft and Jerry Jones when they were discussing what commissioner Roger Goodell should be compensated for his position. Plus, Colts owner Jim Irsay said Washington Commanders owner Dan Snyder should possibly be removed for all of the controversies he's been involved in. What is happening between one of the most tight-lipped groups we've ever seen. Also, is Tom Brady no longer enjoying the game? One of his old foes believes so.
author: smanderville@houseofathlete.com (Brandon Marshall, Lesean MCcoy, LEger Douzable)
